page.title: 14SOCIAL LIFE IN BICESTER
page.content: The former cinema has been converted into a Bingo hall which has very popular sessions most evenings.Dances, whist drives, tombola sessions, musical and dramatic performances all take place at various halls in town. There is a large number of pubs in Bicester which serve food and have gardens open to the public.There are also Chinese and Indian restaurants in the centre of town. There are two Youth clubs, one of them is run by the Methodist church.The Catholic Youth club closed down recently.The scouts and guides also have troops in the town and are popular with many of the younger residents.
